title: Flipkart | SDE2 | Bangalore | Feb 2025
content:
Education: Btech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 4.5
Prior Experience: SDE1 at Amazon(2.5 yrs)
Current Comp: 22+ LPA Fixed + RSUs(~8LPA)
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bengaluru, India
Salary: Rs 28,00,000
Stock bonus: 96 stock units $16,734 stock grant vested over 4 years equally.
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 10% of salary every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~Rs 34.5 LPA

Other details: Negotiated once and hard but it didn't worked. Was given two days to accept or decline the offer.

Interview exp: https://leetcode.com/discuss/general-discussion/6112758/flipkart-sde2-bangalore-toupdate-2024-st-6ppp/

title: Blinkit | SDE2 | Gurgaon | 3.5 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech  from Tier 3 College.
Years of Experience: 3 years 5 months
Prior Experience: SDE1 at PBC.
Current Comp:- 28 Fixed + 1.35 bonus (29.35 CTC)
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: Blinkit
Title/Level: SDE2
Location: Gurgaon
Salary: 35 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: No
Bonus: 10 LPA every year
Total comp (Salary + Bonu): 45 LPA.
